# ASI (Agent Skill Interface)

> ASI is a behavioral contract for agentic systems that defines determinism-before-reasoning, strict passivity, explicit failure semantics, and auditable scope.

Use the links below as the recommended progressive disclosure entrypoints.

## Entry Points

- [README](README.md): Overview and recommended reading path.
- [Manifesto](docs/manifesto/.INDEX.md): Narrative framing for ASI.
- [Specifications](docs/spec/.INDEX.md): RFC index and normative requirements.
- [Design Principles](docs/design-principles/.INDEX.md): Implementation guidance.
- [Patterns](docs/patterns/.INDEX.md): Best-practice patterns.
- [Skill Authoring Specs](docs/design/specs/.INDEX.md): Canonical authoring requirements.
